description: Codyy and Taylor graduated high school together. They have been friends for about 5 years. Codyy has been realizing he might be gay, well, at least, he thinks about dick a lot of the time. He was hanging with Taylor the other day, and, Codyy's parents being gone, they had the house to themselves. They went on a bike ride and returned to an empty house, all sweaty and wonderfully stinky, mmmmm, teen boy sweat. This was Codyy's chance to seduce Taylor. He told him there was only one shower in the house and asked to share the water. Taylor agreed and Codyy got his dream cum true...
title: Tasting Cody
